page.title: 12Life in Colden Common 2.
page.content: The local policeman is closely involved with the community.He operates as part of a 9 man team covering a number of local villages. From his house in the village he is responsible for an area containing about 8000 people.Much of his work is aimed at crime prevention through "community policing",working with the co-operation of the villagers.He also attends meetings of the Parish Council. Transport amenities in the village are largely provided by private cars since the bus service is relatively inconvenient,especially in the evening.Thus,for those people most affected - the elderly and the young- social life can be restricted and this gives rise to some concern.
